Step 1: Listing down all species collected by each PRA team member. Including local name, uses and otherdetails; 

Step 2: Discussion with the community.

Step 1:PRA team conduct informal Exposure Walk in Village

 Step 2: Observe and Record all information during Informal Exposure Walk.
